name: Carlos Rodriguez

Fluent in English, he navigates his athletic career while managing a significant fear of dogs. In his spare time, Carlos enjoys making music, with a particular love for the Reggae genre, and playing his favorite sport, tennis. He drives a Lavender Tesla Model 3 and often enjoys a meal of Pad Thai with a cup of tea. His favorite board game is Ticket to Ride, and he dreams of visiting his favorite city, Singapore. A peculiar fact about Carlos is that he keeps a pet chicken, all while dealing with a mold allergy.
